PythonCoE Development¶

About Us¶

We are here to help Python developers across the enterprise. We are part of the Application Development Center of Expertise, where we also help with technologies such as .NET, DevOps, Java, mobile apps, and the Power platform.

Services¶

The Python COE offers the following services:

  • Provide suggestions for tools, platforms, and frameworks.

  • Create software installs for popular tooling.

  • Collaborate, consult, and mentor on the following.

    • Architecture

    • Design

    • Testing

    • Secure development

    • DevOps

  • Ensure integrity and quality of Caterpillar applications by providing security, legal, brand and design guidelines.

  • Help developers meet these guidelines by coaching on using tools that can be integrated into build pipelines, exposing issues sooner in development.

  • Where teams lack expertise, help developers fine-tune applications to meet these guidelines.

Additional Services¶

In an effort to improve developer productivity, we also offer some services across the enterprise by:

  • Providing generalized guidance for identity access management, security, legal, and brand concerns.

  • Developing best practices and examples for Python development.

  • Representing developers on enterprise projects as subject matter experts in the areas of information security, cloud, enterprise architecture, human resources, identity access management, legal, and brand.

  • Researching emerging technologies allowing us to provide expert guidance to developers and application architects.

  • Proactively identifying opportunities and issues in Python development and communicating these through day to day coaching and official communications.

  • Administering developer surveys and the Application Development Technology Radar that provide community activities and help developers learn about and understand development-related technology.

  • Documenting common developer issues and resolutions in a wiki available to all Python developers.

Contact Us¶

Please use one of the following methods to reach out to our team for assistance:

ServiceNow Assignment Group: PYTHON-COE

Group Email: python_coe@cat.com
